description: To mitigate the issue related to CVE-2023-36036, users are advised to apply the relevant updates available for Windows operating systems. Specifically, systems should be updated using KB-5032196, KB-5032190, KB-5032192, and KB-5032189. These updates are essential for Windows versions including 10 and 11, addressing the vulnerabilities in the Windows Cloud Files Mini Filter Driver. Users can download the patches from the Microsoft Update Catalog at the following links: [KB5032196](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032196), [KB5032190](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190), [KB5032192](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192), and [KB5032189](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189). Make sure to check the build numbers of your Windows installation to ensure compatibility with these updates.
